patthana22.27:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho sahetuko
patthana22.27:1.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana22.27:1.1_2: anidassanaappaṭigho sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
patthana22.27:1.1_3: nasahetukañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
patthana22.27:1.1_4: sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.27:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana22.27:3.1: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana22.27:4.1_1: paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.27:4.1_2: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
